about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Jericho rank 15 command fighter “Saw One”
  • Active module “Downpour” system
  • Special title “Blood Reaper” — for successfully completing missions that involve defeating a large number of enemies in a short period of time.
  • Special ammunition against aliens — “Resonating crystal”, “Resonating charges”, “Resonating slugs” — 30 pcs.
  • Special missiles “Crystal drone” — 30 pcs.
  • Portrait “Angela Mitchell”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 14 days!

The newest Jericho attack aircraft, titled “Saw One”, is a magnificent example of the most advanced technologies. Unfortunately, the price for power was high. Two large laboratories were completely destroyed when the ship self-activated during the tests. More than forty scientists and countless pilots died trying to capture the self-willed machine. And what else could be expected when the heads of the Mendes family ordered to recreate the mechanisms of the “Defiler” — a ship left after a battle with the Aliens? The Council of Families abandoned the project, and the Mendes had to complete it on their own. Once “Saw One” was completed, the family provided the ship to the most desperate mercenaries. If anyone can direct his destructive power in the right direction, it’s them.

Welcome aboard the newest fighter “Saw One”! This ship is a real technological breakthrough. Purchase “Saw One” today and become one of those who can control this powerful machine!

name: Star Conflict - Saw One

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This pack includes:Jericho rank 15 command fighter “Saw One”Active module “Downpour” systemSpecial title “Blood Reaper” — for successfully completing missions that involve defeating a large number of enemies in a short period of time.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
